title: FONTRESEARCH
content:
I am looking for the name of this font. can anybody help. it would be great.

[http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=35152](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317075438/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=35152 "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=35152")

BIG THANKS for any reply,

cheers,  
carina\*

ps:  
i like the round character and the form, which is similar to the DIN. this font is also a little bit similar to the CONDUIT [but cleaner in detail].
author: Carina58

comments.content: I think part of the softness on this is from ink spread and not the font itself. Thought it was Meta or Info, but no.
Where did you get this sample? The name of the company might help...
